songs.title: Juice (Streaming Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Spoken]
Hey, so I really wanted "Juice" to be on the mixtape but I couldn't uh, get it cleared in time. But, every time you play this track all the way through, all the streaming proceeds go directly to SocialWorks so, run this back and play it all the way through. Uh, again, I really appreciate you guys being here, since day one and uh, the album is coming real soon. Igh!
